document.forum_title: Latest Europe News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: WTO backs EU in row over Russian import ban on pigs, pork
document.topic_text: WTO backs EU in row over Russian import ban on pigs, pork Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 2 hours ago ) A World Trade Organization (WTO) panel on 19 August backed the European Union (EU) in a two-year dispute over Russia's ban on pig and pork imports from the bloc.
document.post: WTO backs EU in row over Russian import ban on pigs, pork Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 2 hours ago ) A World Trade Organization (WTO) panel on 19 August backed the European Union (EU) in a two-year dispute over Russia's ban on pig and pork imports from the bloc.
